flawed_nl_solution:
When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=160>>160 seashells.
When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 160-30 = <<160-30=130>>130 seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*130 = <<65=65>>65 seashells
He was left with 130-65= <<130-65=65>>65 seashells

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 140, not 160. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
